content: you ll love this delightful crochet blanket pattern that features a wide v_stitch that s easy to memorize and do after the foundation row stitches are worked in chain spaces from the previous row making it easy to see where to place your crochet hook made using double_crochet stitches and chain stitches it s ideal for newer crocheters or intermediate crocheters looking for a project with relaxing repeats the color variations of bernat toasty perfectly accentuate the stitchwork for a gorgeous texture that adds interest to any interior setting
